name: Autodialer Application
description: AI-powered autodialer system for bulk phone calling with natural language commands

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID from https://console.twilio.com/

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token from https://console.twilio.com/

GEMINI_API_KEY.description: Your Google Gemini API Key from https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey

MAX_NUMBERS.description: Maximum number of phone numbers to store
